description: Sticky BBQ sauce coats chicken drumsticks for a one-tray bake that pairs swimmingly with spring veggies and brown rice.
name: Smokey Drumsticks With Vegetable Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup F. Whitlock Smokey BBQ sauce
2 cups Birds Eye snap-frozen spring greens mix

recipeInstructions.text: Microwave rice according to package instructions. Divide rice, drumsticks and vegetables amongst plates to serve.
